headline: Steve Jobs Was Notoriously Demanding But Pixar's Ed Catmull Never Had A Loud Disagreement With The Apple Co-Founder: This Is His Secret

headline: Berkshire was a net seller of stocks in Buffett's final quarter as CEO
summary: During Warren Buffett's last quarter as CEO, Berkshire Hathaway sold more equities than it bought, continuing to whittle away at its big Apple and Bank of America stakes and slashing its already modest Amazon.com holding.
